snippet: As Saints officials were appealing their suspensions by the N.F.L., a tape was released on which Gregg Williams directed his players to hit various San Francisco players in the head.
abstract: Audio tape surfaces in which former New Orleans Saints defensive coordinator Gregg Williams explicitly directs his team to inflict physical damage on specific players in playoff game against San Francisco 49ers; speaks repeatedly of hitting opponents' heads; tape surfaces hours before Saints officials meet with NFL commissioner Roger Goodell to appeal their suspensions.
lead_paragraph: As Saints officials were appealing their suspensions by the N.F.L., a tape was released on which Gregg Williams directed his players to hit various San Francisco players in the head.

headline.seo: Tape Reveals Saints’ Williams Singling Out 49ers for Injury
headline.main: Tape Reveals Coach Asking for Injuries
headline.print_headline: Tape Reveals Coach Asking for Injuries
